intro_text: Clinically diagnosed Programming Addict! In love with building all sorts of projects with a variety of technologies. When I am not developing, testing, or documenting, you'll probably find me walking my dog, Clio, tinkering in the garage, or in front of a video game.
intro_text2: This page is to document and display my progress as a software, website, video game developer. There will be some information on my educational and professional background, as well as a project portfolio gallery and some other fun things that interest me. Feel free to reach out with comments or collaboration.
education_text: Education is important! While not required to follow the developers path, I found my time at university indispensable and extremely enjoyable. Flip through these cards and see where I've attended.

experience.experience_description: Java, Swing, Angular development on the MPS application: EnterpriseRx (Hosted Pharmacy Management System)

Developed applications which contributed to the solution of business problems or needs of the bank. Tech stack mainly consisted of Mainframe (COBOL, JCL, CICS, IDMS). Participated in various stages of the SDLC: Conducting research, systems analysis, obtaining approvals, presenting requirements, specifications, and development plans to committees, programming, testing, and documenation.

Reviewed up to 100 warranty claims per day, which required the parsing of technical descriptions and supporting test data from technicians. Worked with several departments to ensure that responsible parties would deliver appropriate documentation for each stage of the repair process, improving turn around time on paid claims.

Supervised maintenance and restoration projects for hospitality, residential, and industrial properties. Performed site surveys of primary building systems. Primary clients included Ritz-Carlton Dubai Marina and Le Meridian Dubai Hotel. Worked on several projects with teams from diverse cultural, language, and religious backgrounds. (European, South Asian, Middle Eastern)

Maintained warranty standards across three different islands. Processed claims valued over $20,000. Helped process necessary internal paperwork to maintain an in-house loaner fleet of over 70 vehicles.
